overview: Lola Lokidor is an intergalactic adventurer who is afraid of nothing but clothes and too long periods in the galley. Without fuss, she goes on missions, dealing with everything coming from space distress. Her last job? Postman for the Glactic Confederation posts. Prepare for a hallucinated and frenzied journey to the rhythm of the psychedelic trance that we listen to in his spaceship, the Lost-Angeles.
title: L'aventurière des courriers perdus
